name: Casa Schuck Boutique Hotel

reviews.title: The Tree Monkies
reviews.text: One only needs to believe in the magic that Casa Schuck holds to see the monkies that live in the trees there! There is a special magic that you feel from the moment you set foot inside the doors & see the beautiful gardens & well kept grounds; enjoy the warmth & gracious hospitality of Susan,Chuck & their wonderful staff; relax by the poolside or savor the magnificant rooftop view of the city. If you are looking for a memorable, magical get-away, this is it. Dream a little. Believe a little........you'll see the monkies too! (just don't feed them!)

reviews.title: Enjoyed SMA and Casa Schuck
reviews.text: This was our first visit to SMA and Casa Schuck. Both are wonderful! The home is interesting with a beautiful courtyard and nice rooms. We were in the Jacaranda room, which is small but private with a balcony overlooking the rooftops of SMA. Note that since there is no A/C, nighttime comfort during warm weather is enhanced by leaving the balcony doors open at the expense of some privacy. Breakfast is low key with a set menu of 5 or 6, mainly egg dish, options.

reviews.title: Live like you deserve at this wonderful getaway
reviews.text: Susan and Chuck are great and were around during the day, but were not intrusive. Casa Schuck is four blocks from the main square - be warned that the hills are steep and sidewalks narrow. Restaurants in town are wonderful and most are within walking distance of Casa Schuck.

reviews.title: Hospitality, organization and beauty--Casa Schuck's a treasure
reviews.text: Overall, Casa Schuck is a nice retreat in quaint San Miguel de Allende.

reviews.title: Extraordinary hotel, amazing
reviews.text: This Bed & Breakfast surpasses my expectations. The service is impeccable, the room spotless and every need seems to be effortlessly anticipated and accomodated. The rooms are so clean. Location is superb. The Breakfast was um-um-GOOD. If you want to feel like royalty in San Miguel de Allende, then don't miss staying there.

reviews.title: Casa Schuck is "A Class Act"
reviews.text: SMA is a national treasure. So is Casa Schuck. The views are great, the location ideal, the food is well prepared, the rooms are large, the mattresses are comfortable, the courtyard is gorgeous, the staff accommodating--but what makes Casa Schuck tick and what makes it a valued place for spending down time in San Miguel, is the organization, attention to details and the first class availability of accurate information on about any subject. reviews.title: Casa Schuck...home away from home
reviews.text: Beautiful accommodations, friendly staff and excellent service marked our six day stay at Casa Schuck. We were treated like family in this lovely home away from home, and every effort was made to meet our requests for tours, shopping and restaurants. The views from the sun deck rooftop are spectacular, and the breeze there make it a quiet spot for sunbathing or just reading a good book. Our room was spacious and comfortable and we thoroughly enjoyed our morning breakfasts with a selection of dishes to choose from.(We liked the fact that breakfast was served until ll a.m., if we chose to go later). We deeply appreciate Susan and Chuck and staff for making our stay incredibly comfortable and relaxing.

reviews.title: Wow, how special this place is.....
reviews.text: If you want a chance to feel the soul and comfort of old Mexico and live like a king & queen, go to Casa Schuck! The special touches such as antiques, candles, arresting art and very comfy beds! The breakfast is great with fruits, fresh breads and wonderful entrees that leave you anticipating the next day's selection. The staff is amazing. We were able to experience history, art, shopping and good cuisine so close to where we stayed. The pool dips were fabulously relaxing with a nice massage by the pool. Casa Schuck is an experience not to be missed inside the wondeful experience of San Miguel!

reviews.title: Casa Schuck, best place to stay
reviews.text: We stayed at the Casa Schuck for 4 nights to attend a wedding. The place is so nice it was hard to leave. Everything you want, you'll find at Casa Schuck. Beautiful gardens, lovely rooms, great views and the perfect setting for any occasion. The owners made us feel realy welcome and we highly recommend this place to anybody who wants to stay in San Miguel.

reviews.title: Plan to go back
reviews.text: This was a wonderful place to stay in San Miguel. The room was clean, spacious and well appointed. The courtyard was elegant- the perfect place for breakfast, or a drink in the afternoon. The staff was helpful, found us everything from an ATV, delivered to our door, to the best resteraunts. An easy walk to the center of town, yet on a quiet (for San Miguel) street.

reviews.title: the best spot and so close to it all
reviews.text: We plan to stay there again when we go back.

description: Casa Schuck boutique hotel, just 3 short blocks to the Main Square (Jardin) and the famous Parrochia cathedral. You are minutes away from shopping, restaurants and galleries. This special boutique hotel offers the chance to live like a king or queen, right in the middle of town and enjoy the local cafes and art world culture. You may not want to leave the house much though, as the rooftop deck may beckon,or you might find a cozy spot to relax in the shaded landscaped courtyard or the heated pool. Rated "2003 Tripadvisor's best Hotel", enjoy the traditional Spanish Colonial architecture and comfortable bedrooms, most with outdoor living areas and terraces. Our personal attention along with the atmosphere makes this spot a favorite choice in San Miguel.
